title: Trump announces Kevin Warsh as fed chair pick
full_text: Trump announces Kevin Warsh as fed chair pick. Trump said his pick to replace current Chairman Jerome Powell is an "outstanding person and a person that won't be too surprising to people.". President Donald Trump has nominated Kevin Warsh to be the new Federal Reserve chairman. In a post on Truth Social early Friday morning, Trump said that he has "known Kevin for a long period of time… [+2014 chars]
